content: are you looking for a trendy and unique accessory to add to your wardrobe look no further than the checkered bucket hat crochet pattern not only is it fashionable but it s also a fun and easy project to crochet this crochet bucket hat was made using worsted weight cotton yarn the finished product is a lightweight and breathable hat that s perfect for any occasion this pattern is suitable for beginners who are learning to crochet but also know techniques like magic_ring and changing colors no sewing is required this crochet bucket hat is made using the yarn under single_crochet 1 technique this technique makes the stitches appear more aligned this crochet pattern makes an adult-sized bucket hat that fits the head size of approximately 21-23 in circumference 1 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2019/08/mini-mimi-cal-part-1-materials html follow me at www onceuponacheerio com | blog www facebook com/onceuponacheerio | facebook www instagram com/onceuponacheerio | instagram www pinterest com/onceuponacheerio | pinterest
